title: Ensure all SolrCore logging also includes core identifier
description: We are currently a bit inconsistent on our logging in SolrCore - ideally each statement would identify which core it relates to to make troubleshooting much easier.

comments.author: Ramkumar Aiyengar
comments.content: Please see SOLR-6673. If we are doing this, that would be the preferred, as it's cleaner than us remembering to add it to each line.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: +1 to whatever we can leverage with MDC.  This was also mentioned on SOLR-5277.

comments.author: Mike Drob
comments.content: Ah, I was unfamiliar with MDC. Cool stuff, I'll close this as a dup.
